summary: PWA Critical Bug Fix Verification Complete - All PWA installation requirements now pass. Content-Type is correctly set to 'application/manifest+json', icons have correct dimensions (192x192 and 512x512), and all PWA infrastructure is properly configured.
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ icon-192.png exists and is exactly 192x192 pixels (verified via PIL)
✅ icon-512.png exists and is exactly 512x512 pixels (verified via PIL)
✅ manifest.json structure is correct with name, short_name, start_url, scope, display, icons
✅ service-worker.js is accessible and returns HTTP 200
✅ craco.config.js has middleware to set Content-Type for /manifest.json
✅ server.js has route handler for /manifest.json with correct Content-Type
✅ Icons use absolute paths (/icon-192.png, /icon-512.png) in manifest
✅ Both 'any' and 'maskable' purpose icons are defined
✅ Service Worker registered successfully in browser

installability.note: All PWA installation criteria met - app should be installable on Android

context_for_next_testing_agent: PWA critical bug has been fixed. All installation requirements verified: 1) Content-Type is application/manifest+json, 2) Icons are real PNG files with correct dimensions (192x192 and 512x512), 3) Manifest structure is valid, 4) Service Worker is registered. The app should now be installable on Android devices.
